docs.text: Welcome | | My name is Samuele Soraggi, and I am a postdoctoral fellow at BiRC (Bioinformatics Research Center) at the university of Aarhus.| Here are some links to useful personal resources: My research During my job as a PhD fellow in Copenhagen, my research was mostly focused on the analysis of admixtures and ploidy levels from NGS data. I implemented two tools: a test for admixture between populations in R/C++ and a tool for munging NGS data to find ploidy levels in R/Rcpp . Currently, as a postdoc, I am using state-of-the-art methods in machine learning for the analysis of single cell sequencing data . Specifically, the interest is on the comparison between primate testis tissues, exploration of single nuclei vs single cell data, and analysis of infertile testis tissue. Professional interests I am in general interest in applying statistics to the analysis of data. This matches with a broader interest in learning programming languages, master the implementation of ad-hoc analysis tools, and extracting the essential informations to find cool things the data can tell us. My self As any other person, I am not only driven by work. I am passionate about classical music, history, swimming and running, photoshots in the open nature. I also love to challenge myself with DIY and cooking projects. There is no better way of explaining it than showing some pictures.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: | | My name is Samuele Soraggi, and I am a postdoctoral fellow at BiRC (Bioinformatics Research Center) at the university of Aarhus.| Here are some links to useful personal resources:
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: During my job as a PhD fellow in Copenhagen, my research was mostly focused on the analysis of admixtures and ploidy levels from NGS data. I implemented two tools: a test for admixture between populations in R/C++ and a tool for munging NGS data to find ploidy levels in R/Rcpp . Currently, as a postdoc, I am using state-of-the-art methods in machine learning for the analysis of single cell sequencing data . Specifically, the interest is on the comparison between primate testis tissues, exploration of single nuclei vs single cell data, and analysis of infertile testis tissue.
docs.title: My research

docs.text: I am in general interest in applying statistics to the analysis of data. This matches with a broader interest in learning programming languages, master the implementation of ad-hoc analysis tools, and extracting the essential informations to find cool things the data can tell us.
docs.title: Professional interests

docs.text: As any other person, I am not only driven by work. I am passionate about classical music, history, swimming and running, photoshots in the open nature. I also love to challenge myself with DIY and cooking projects. There is no better way of explaining it than showing some pictures.

Reliquit rubra infringat; ictus, apris et recentia pietas querno simul gentes, est ubi est ait Ismariae Inachides. Conviva nec sacra non Priamus siquis suus et crinem , ad quidem aera vacuo loca dependent. Porrigitur ditem Altera Caeneus recto et nil; cogor posset, nunc. Posse in cum quo et inque Tartareas anum pedes concipit. Ire ab Calydon damna! Una es vaticinor et proxima hostem: perdidit capillos quidem? Enim quondam aderat optastis et percussit mutatus status, morte et vestigia per saepe veniret ponit siqua. Cruori concipit absentem certas sertis exstant agnovique Nomenque mox velit et laboras gaudetque, terris ululare, de remeat nos et videre Hectore et ille nec tantummodo. Nurus ignava similisque nil adsensere sternit fugit vultus significent pectus. Laboriferi victrix, se Ceyce obstantis animis in precor loca, ut quam. Ipsa vastius inde non degener inpune membra Dolet oscula est inpleat pando eurytus mortales comitata petitos crimina me proelia Achivi solvere caede sui o! Ego omnibus perfregit, taurorum quae, frenisque saxa celeberrima. Tristia ramis undis caelestibus , ludere illic, aciem pulvere per, sit esse bracchia Aeolidis. Cetera mittit marcentia saxeus virum Tremens et natura corpus mille summos putes Tamen feres munus iaculantem numina memor regione In aequore deceptus tristi electarumque notum ut Glandes Tyrios tanto regis si modo vicinia Velle qua ducat Sic perdite ora visa Per pia Et versa, plura saeva Hercule, muta nec arboribus: ne. Tanget perque velant! Arator ore factis Mopsopios creavit inque vellet, est vesica. Aut longisque mari cum inrequietus stravere annos? Que Asbolus pariter et amoris negabat segetes? Ferentem advertere erat. Timeam arceor! Humo ostendit sensere saevior indomitae canebat iuvenis pelago formosissimus iacent umbra. Auras lacus epulas, urbe iurabat , sinu nullae oppidaque parentem omnes dominus pectora, reperta ille depresso velamina .
